definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (God has loved, cf. Sab. [[ורראל]] DHM:ZMG 1883. 15; v. also [[יְדִידְיׇה]]) one of the elders Nu 11:26, Nu 11:27; prob. = [[אֱלִידָד]] Nu 34:21 where called a prince of Benjamin.—On n.pr. with [[אֵל]] cf. those with [[אָב]] & [[אָח]], & esp. Nö:l. c., v. p. 42, & (Sab.) DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 88.
